machinevision-pageinfo-field-suggested-l: Field name for suggested labels in page info table
machinevision-publish: Text for button to save confirmed suggestions
machinevision-publish-title: Title for button to save confirmed suggestions
machinevision-more:
Text for button to show more images. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of images to show
machinevision-more-title:
Title for button to show more images. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of images to show
machinevision-reset: Text for button to reset all suggestions for an image
machinevision-reset-title: Title for button to reset all suggestions for an image
machinevision-close-title:
Title for button to close suggestions for an image. Parameters:
* $1 - File name of image to close
machinevision-suggestion-confirm-title:
Title for button to confirm individual suggestion for an image. Parameters:
* $1 - Text of suggestion to confirm
machinevision-suggestion-confirm-undo-ti:
Title for button to undo individual suggestion confirmation for an image. Parameters:
* $1 - Text of suggestion confirmation to undo
machinevision-suggestion-reject-title:
Title for button to reject individual suggestion for an image. Parameters:
* $1 - Text of suggestion to reject
machinevision-suggestion-reject-undo-tit:
Title for button to undo individual suggestion rejection for an image. Parameters:
* $1 - Text of suggestion rejection to undo
